"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of App vault. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As App vault provides its services based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept App vault services.
